goal.en: 數位技術進步隨之而來的消費型態，市場結構，營運模式的改變，對現代企業產生極大的衝擊，本課程以近來發展趨勢為主軸，探討企業如何利用數位技術在產品發展、客戶開發以及經營模式方面順利轉型。

content.en:
"1. Digital Economy
2. Customer Network
3. Digital Marketing
4. Mobile Payment
5. Platform Economy
6. Platform Mobilization
7. Platform Management
8. Data Asset
9. Mid-Term
10. IOT Business Model
11. Digital Content
12. Long Tail
13
Netflix (9-607-133)(Chinese Version: 610-C04)
Would you have been long or short Blockbuster stock at the time of the case? How about Netflix? Why?
Did Netflix do the same jobs for consumers that Blockbuster did? How did this evolve over time?
Compare Blockbuster’s and Netflix’s profit models. How might the differences affect the respective company’s strategies?
As you examine each major shift in Netflix’s strategy, what might have been an assumptions checklist that they might have used at each stage? What assumptions checklist might you use for VOD?
14
Uber: Changing the way the world moves (9-316-101)
Do you agree or disagree with Uber’s surge pricing policy? What are the reasons it can be perceived as unfair? What are the risks of the policy to Uber? Given these risks, Should Uber modify its policy?
Uber has become enormously popular among consumer in a very short period of time. How has the company accomplished this?
How robust is Uber’s operating model? What are the weak links for its service model?
15
Online Restaurant Promotion (9-909-034)
What are the key success factors for each business model?
If you had to invest in one of these businesses, which would you choose? Why?
Who pays for these restaurant promotion services?
16 Mednet.com (2066)
What does an advertiser want? Sales, leads, brand awareness?
What specific consumer behaviors determine whether or not a business model produces the results an advertiser wants? What are the best metrics for measuring these?
What is the best argument Heather yates can make to justify charging Windham Pharmaceuticals for impressions instead of click-throughs? Does she have acceptable alternatives?
What value to the customer does a general interest site contribute that a niche site can’t?
What steps can MedNet take to address emerging competitive threats?
17
Apple Pay (8-516-027)
Will Apple Pay be a huge success with consumers? Why or why not? ?
Why did banks agree to partner with Apple for Apple Pay in the U.S.? ?
Are retailers excited about Apple Pay? Why or why not? ?
What is Apple’s motivation in launching Apple Pay?
Should Apple make any changes to its Apple Pay roll-out plan?
18. Final"
